attributes.additional_details:
All stores nationwide selling a car seat must be fully trained in the safety and fitting of car seats.

A certificate/checklist should be produced only once the member of staff has checked the seat fits safely and is compatible in your vehicle.

Not all cars are compatible therefore some can cause buckle crunching allowing the buckle to open on impact and child seat to be unsecured.

Online selling of car seats banned unless it is through a company who has already carried out the safety check and orders on your behalf.

This is extremely important and could save the life of a child which could be yours.

80% of seats purchased are not compatible with the vehicle they are fitted in.
